channel.title: Looking for a server host
channel.description:
Due to my computer lags, and my father dose not want me to unblock the port needed, I'm looking for a good 24/7 host that is not currently hosting a server, but has the ideas of how to host one, I need a dedicated person, and they need to know how to make an FTP setup, and the port could possibly be 43594. If you could, leave a message here, or contact me with:
AIM: PloxieScape@aim.com might not need @aim.com. MSN: Boomk_xd@hotmail.com I am currently on MSN, so let me know if you can host it for me.
-M,i,k,e
P.S: Moderators if this is in the wrong section, please Move, Lock, Delete whatever is needed, Thank you.

item.title: Looking for a server host
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e M,i,K,e
item.description:
@M_i_K_e wrote:

I didn’t actually make, based on GangScape v5, but it is edited, it’s in the beta stages, been trying to work on it abit, but it’s taking time, I just need a host, I’ll be putting the final up soon as it’s done, maybe even let it out for download alot to do, little time.

-M,i,k,e

theres like no risk i know for it your cp to eat it self.... i don;t think any1 here would wanna do tht lol....wen i made my server...i didnt set up nothing just jdk and hamachi and it was ok....except i had like Dial-Up then thts why it sucked but u know Posted on: July 16, 2007, 05:14:38 PMur co.nr redirects to ur website...wats wrong with it??? get mine its beter

Well, I don’t want to use Hamachi anymore, I have before, it just isn’t my kind of server liking, no one really have gotten on, my Forums direct to my PhPBB Forum.

Read full topic
